about_the_game:
Find a Study Buddy

CloudStudy is an innovative multiplayer game that blurs the lines between traditional learning and entertainment, creating a unique virtual learning and living community for global players. In this limitless virtual campus, you'll encounter like-minded individuals from around the world, exploring the vast ocean of knowledge and sharing the joy of learning together.



Virtual Campus

Upon entering CloudStudy, you'll step into a carefully designed virtual campus. Here, spacious classrooms await, where you can listen to lectures and interact with classmates from all over the globe. Cosy dormitories provide a place to rest and unwind, while vibrant gyms and game halls offer outlets for stress relief and physical exercise during breaks.



Grow Together

In CloudStudy, you'll never feel alone. Connect and interact with players from around the world, encouraging and supervising each other to maintain healthy schedules, work, and learning progress. We understand that staying motivated can be challenging when doing it alone, but in CloudStudy, you'll find companions who will walk alongside you on your journey.



Learning Environment

CloudStudy offers various smart assistance mechanisms to help you better plan your study and life. Feeling stiff after long hours of study? The reminder system will prompt you to take a break and move around, maintaining your optimal learning state. Want to organize your daily schedule? Our time management system allows you to easily set and track your plans. Enter the Focus Mode, where the screen dims, displaying a clock, while curated music accompanies you through each concentrated moment.



Custom Decorations

CloudStudy encourages creativity, allowing you to customize your space through the DIY mode. Whether it's your classroom seat or dormitory layout, you can decorate it according to your preferences. Maintaining a regular schedule and active participation will quickly earn you points, which can be redeemed for various ornaments and decorations, making your space uniquely and warmly yours.



CloudStudy is not just a game; it's a vibrant learning and living community with endless possibilities. Here, you'll grow and progress alongside global players, experiencing the joy and sense of achievement that come from learning. Join us now! Embark on your new learning journey in CloudStudy!
